comments.body: nit: its becomes a little awkward to have a class `EventBatch` that has a field `eventBatch`. It would be "nicer" to call this field `events`.
comments.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,40 @@

+
+@namespace("org.apache.spark.flume")
+
+protocol SparkFlumeProtocol {
+
+  record SparkSinkEvent {
+    map<string> headers;
+    bytes body;
+  }
+
+  record EventBatch {
+    string sequenceNumber;
+    array<SparkSinkEvent> eventBatch;
